it.cnr.isti.thematrix.configuration.mapping

Class RecodingTable

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.cnr.isti.thematrix.configuration.mapping.RecodingTable
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ICheckable

    public class RecodingTable
extends java.lang.Object
implements ICheckable
    Class for a recoding table inside a a mapping descriptor, handles the recodingTable XML tag. This class interfaces with XML parsing via annotations to get most of its fields initialized. The recoding from src to dest values will be used more often, so such an hashmap can be asked to this class. HashMap will be null if no value tags are found, which is an error anyway.

      • getValues

        public java.util.Collection<Value> getValues()

      • getAsHashMap

        public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> getAsHashMap()
        Get the HashMap with src values as Keys and dest values as values. It initializes the hashmap on first call, and will return a null reference if no values were defined for this recoding table. Note that this is in fact an error: we should warn the user here.
        Returns:
